markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 0"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basic Corrective Lenses](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1354)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 70</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) All Pathfinder Society agents also have access to all assistive items from Morhen’s Mobility Apparel_

**Price** 5 sp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A set of corrective lenses might take the form of eyeglasses or specialized goggles. You can don or remove your corrective lenses as an Interact action.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Basic Corrective Lenses
